objects.description: [KillDisk](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0607) has attempted to get the access token of a process by calling OpenProcessToken. If [KillDisk](https://attack.mitre.org/software/S0607) gets the access token, then it attempt to modify the token privileges with AdjustTokenPrivileges.(Citation: Trend Micro KillDisk 2)

external_references.description: Gilbert Sison, Rheniel Ramos, Jay Yaneza, Alfredo Oliveira. (2018, January 15). KillDisk Variant Hits Latin American Financial Groups. Retrieved January 12, 2021.
